"Guiden": "For ARKS who have mastered a class, and they yet still surpass their limits, a symbol appears."
"I don't really know how it works, myself..."
"According to researchers, it's some sort of crystallization of your inner Photons, or something."
"Theories aside, these symbols appear when an individual takes a step beyond what should have been their absolute limit."
"This symbol might not show up for you, but why not try it out anyways as part of your training?"
